Title: Annie
Writer: Irene Mecchi (teleplay), Thomas Meehan (book), Martin Charnin (lyrics)
Actors: Kathy Bates, Victor Garber, Alan Cumming, Audra McDonald
Plot: A little orphan girl catches the attention of a kind man named Mr. Warbucks, who wants to adopt her, but the cruel, strict orphanage owner has a scheme to keep Annie - and her reward money.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 9 wins & 23 nominations.
